Pipes

Built to the utmost quality to withstand some harsh, rocky treatment. MincoTech pipes range in size, thickness, weight and material. Our team can guide you on the best product for the job.

Benefits

Unequalled durability

Quality

Fit

Sustainable

Due to significant cost savings, we recently ordered a large number of pipes from Minco Tech rather than from our usual supplier. Everyone within our organisation agreed the quality and delivery time were exceptional. We were so impressed we have just placed another larger order.

Cast Basalt Pipes

DOWNLOAD

Cast Basalt is a natural mineral material that provides an excellent hardwearing surface for corrosive wear and abrasion protection of equipment. We use a Basalt lining to significantly increase the service life of our pipes at a cost-effective price.

Cast pipe fittings

Minco Tech supply a large range of Cast Pipe Fittings to suit many applications. Our High Chrome White Iron Castings pipes offer excellent performance under erosive conditions. This alloy can be effectively used in a wide range of mining, quarrying, power generation and general mineral processing industries.

Pipe Couplings

We supply robust, heavy-duty pipe coupling for the mining industry, suitable for connecting, repair joints, and pump suction.

Mincowrap Pipe Repair Bandage

Sometimes repairs are required. We hold a range of pipe repair bandages should you need them.
